title: Sticky Bottle DQs, Yellow Cards, Sanction Bonanza: UCI Comes Out Swinging In ‘Project Safety’
content:
Governing body made a statement last week with new regulations at TDU, but skeptics are pointing to possibility of 'professional fouls,' convoy stresses, and more.

Read the full article at Sticky Bottle DQs, Yellow Cards, Sanction Bonanza: UCI Comes Out Swinging In ‘Project Safety’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
